dcterms:description: A citation network dataset where each node corresponds to a scientific publication, and edges correspond to citations. The goal is to predict the category of each publication.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Galligher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset similar to Cora, where each node represents a scientific publication and edges represent citations. The objective is to classify the publications into categories.
dcterms:title: Citeseer

dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Galligher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset where nodes are scientific publications and edges are citations. The task is to predict the category of each publication.
dcterms:title: Pubmed

dcterms:creator: R.M. Anderson
R.M. May
dcterms:description: A dataset simulating the SIR disease spreading model, where the label of a node indicates if it is infected or not.
dcterms:title: Disease
